name: Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 2
name_original: Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 2
description:
Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 2 is an educational puzzle game developed by IE Institute. It was originally released in 2013. IE Institute published the game.
Phonics Fun with Biff, Chip & Kipper Vol. 2 is available on Nintendo 3DS.
